accuracy.description: The accuracy of the solution to the problem

conciseness.description: The conciseness of the solution and explanation provided by the system

comprehensibility.description: The clarity and comprehensibility of the solution and explanation given by the system

speed.description: The time taken by the system to generate a solution

appropriateness.description: The level of appropriateness of the solution to the given problem, considering factors such as problem level and type
